member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsExternalInit
member.summary: Reserved to be used by the compiler for tracking metadata. This class should not be used by developers in source code.
member.remarks: This definition is provided by the IsExternalInit NuGet package (https://www.nuget.org/packages/IsExternalInit). Please see https://github.com/manuelroemer/IsExternalInit for more information.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Resources.Strings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Resources.Strings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Resources.Strings.CodeAnalysis_Category
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Upgrade.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Upgrade to .NET MAUI.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Resources.Strings.CodeAnalysis_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You can apply the code fixes or run the .NET Upgrade Assistant to discover and apply all upgrade changes to the whole project.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Xamarin code should be upgraded to .NET MAUI.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.TargetFrameworks.XamarinTargetFrameworkProvider
member.summary: Xamarin Android or iOS target framework matcher.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Traits.MauiTraitProvider
member.summary: Discover project traits specific to Maui and Xamarin project types. Features that support either can specify traits as "Xamarin | Maui".

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.Code.CSharp.IOSNativeHandleTransformer
member.summary: Constructors of Foundation.NSObject or ObjCRuntime.DisposableObject types changed to take ObjCRuntime.NativeHandle instead of IntPtr. We ASSUME that if derived class has constructor which takes exactly one IntPtr then it will pass it to the base class constructor and thus needs to be changed to ObjCRuntime.NativeHandle.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.Code.CSharp.MauiMemberMapTransformer
member.summary: Replaces Xamarin members with new MAUI equivalents.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.Code.CSharp.MauiNamespaceMapTransformer
member.summary: Replaces Xamarin namespaces with new MAUI namespaces.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.Code.CSharp.MauiTypeMapTransformer
member.summary: Replaces Xamarin types with new MAUI types.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.Code.Xaml.AndroidManifestTransformer
member.summary: Updates the AndroidManifest.xml file.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.Code.Xaml.IOSInfoPListTransformer
member.summary: Updates the info.plist file.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.Code.Xaml.MauiXamlNamespaceTransformer
member.summary: Upgrades Xamarin xaml files and performs basic XAML root namespace replacements.

member.name: F:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.Code.Xaml.MauiXamlNamespaceTransformer.XmlNamespaces
member.summary: Mapping of xmlns values.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.Package.MauiControlsPackageTransformer
member.summary: MauiControlsPackageMapTransformer adds new package references introduced in .Net 8.0 for Maui.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.Package.MauiPackageMapTransformer
member.summary: Maui default packages transformer (uses package map embedded json file to decide how to upgrade packages).

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.AllowUnsafeBlocksTransformer
member.summary: Project transformer that carries over AllowUnsafeBlocks if it is set to true.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.MauiAndroidPropertiesTransformer
member.summary: Maui Android project properties transformer

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.MauiDesktopPropertiesTransformer
member.summary: Maui WinUI project properties transformer

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.MauiiOSPropertiesTransformer
member.summary: Maui iOS project properties transformer

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.MauiLibraryPropertiesTransformer
member.summary: Maui library project properties transformer

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.MauiProjectFilesRenameTransformer
member.summary: Renames unnecessary files when converting Xamarin.Forms projects to .Net Maui by appending an ".original" tag to the end of the file.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.MauiProjectTransformer
member.summary: Maui project transformer that makes critical project changes, such as replacing TargetFramework with TargetFrameworks and setting UseMaui.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.MauiProjectUsingTransformer
member.summary: Maui project transformer that adds project-wide using statements.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.MauiSingleProjectTransformer
member.summary: Maui project transformer that targets upgrading Maui applications to newer versions of DotNet.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.MauiTargetFrameworksTransformer
member.summary: Maui target frameworks transformer that makes string replacements across the targeted project file to update any target framework reference.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.MauiTargetFrameworkProjectTransformer
member.summary: Maui in-place TargetFramework transformer that modifies TargetFramework(s) properties in the context and adds the platforms "android" and "ios" to it.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.MauiCreateProjectOperationInitializerTransformer
member.summary: Maui side-by-side TargetFramework transformer that modifies TargetFramework(s) properties in the context and adds the platforms "android" and "ios" to it.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.MauiProjectTemplateItemTransformer
member.summary: Maui template transformer that adds project template items during in-place transformations.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.MauiWinUIFilesRenameTransformer
member.summary: Renames unnecessary files when converting Xamarin.Forms UWP projects to .Net Maui by appending an ".original" tag to the end of the file.

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.MsbuildProjectTransformerBase
member.summary: Base class for project transformers which need to use MSBuild projects

member.name: F:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Maui.Transformers.MsbuildProjectTransformerBase.LegacyRuntimeSeparators
member.summary: Separators for runtime identifier values in Xamarin Forms projects

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Operations.Finalizers.MauiProjectOperationFinalizer
member.summary: Makes final edits to remove artifacts that were added to run Maui upgrades successfully.
